content: {"name": "Sturgis Recreation Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.phila.gov/food/?fbclid=IwAR1KFfmGkseNeQsSAKcOzhJXx400E4xtzNwZA10AHVSclYi7kr7dPSNDBac&address=200%20W%2065th%20Ave.", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "200 W 65th Ave.", "address_2": null, "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19126", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.04916687619573, "longitude": -75.12358528407107}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 685-2877", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}]}
